item.endrem.old_pearl.description: 傳說這隻眼睛曾經是屬於某個巨大的沙蟲
item.endrem.rogue_pearl.description: 據說這顆眼睛使我們的祖先對紅石有了認知
item.endrem.nether_pearl.description: 祂在以太與地獄之間的戰鬥中被惡魔迷失了
item.endrem.cold_pearl.description: 傳說是極凍行者在消失之前留下的最後一件文物
item.endrem.magical_pearl.description: 沒有了這隻眼睛，喚魔者將能力大幅削弱
item.endrem.black_pearl.description: 海盜說，祂看到過這顆傳說中的黑珍珠
item.endrem.lost_pearl.description: 據說這是由世上第一批鐵匠鍛造而成的
item.endrem.wither_pearl.description: 目睹了毀滅。也許祂也見證了你的消失
item.endrem.guardian_pearl.description: 祂已經看到過許多戰士被淹沒在海底深處
item.endrem.end_crystal_pearl.descriptio: 據說，祂擁有終界龍的靈魂碎片
item.endrem.corrupted_pearl.description: 從貪婪的國王的眼睛在孤獨中褪去。傳說它將為擁有者帶來無限的財富
item.endrem.armor.description.main: 造成致命一擊時，獲得1秒的回復II效果
item.endrem.armor.description.shift: With a full End Crystal Armor, the effect lasts 4 seconds
advancements.main.root.title: 冒險啟程
advancements.main.root.end_crystal_armor: 獲得全套終界水晶盔甲

advancements.main.rogue_pearl.title: 歡迎來到叢林!
advancements.main.nether_pearl.title: 凝視深淵
advancements.main.cold_pearl.title: 看起來很"冷"酷喔!
advancements.main.corrupted_pearl.title: 用綠寶石包覆我!

advancements.main.magical_pearl.title: 墮落巫師
advancements.main.black_pearl.title: ㄜ…我的船在哪?
advancements.main.lost_pearl.title: 需要地圖嗎!
advancements.main.wither_pearl.title: 你渴望凋零嗎?
advancements.main.end_crystal_pearl.desc: 拿到第一個終界水晶之眼!
advancements.main.guardian_pearl.title: 現在誰才是神殿的守護者?
advancements.main.core.title: 近在咫尺了!
advancements.main.powered_core.title: 感到…充滿力量?
advancements.main.find_end_castle.title: 漫漫長途
endrem.config.title: End Remastered 設定檔
endrem.config.restart_message: 更改距離後必須重新啟動遊戲
item.endrem.old_eye.description: Legends say this eye once belonged to one of the great Sandworms
item.endrem.rogue_eye.description: This eye is believed to have given our ancestors the knowledge of Redstone
item.endrem.nether_eye.description: It was lost by a demon in the battle between the Aether and the Nether
item.endrem.cold_eye.description: One of the last artifacts left behind by the Iceologers before they all suddenly vanished from the world
item.endrem.magical_eye.description: Without this eye, the Evoker has no power
item.endrem.black_eye.description: Pirates say it gave sight to the legendary Black eye
item.endrem.lost_eye.description: It is told that it was forged by the first blacksmiths of time
item.endrem.wither_eye.description: Has witnessed destruction. Maybe it also witnessed your stuff disappear
item.endrem.guardian_eye.description: It has seen many warriors drown into the depths of the sea
item.endrem.end_crystal_eye.description: It is believed to hold a fragment of the Enderdragon Soul
item.endrem.corrupted_eye.description: The eye of a greedy king that faded in solitude. Legend says it will bring infinite fortune to its owner
item.endrem.witch_eye.description: This pupil is believed to have seen the ancient brewing recipes that were lost in time.
